products.name: Dark & Stormy
products.subtitle: Aged old acquired taste
products.description: The classic rum rebel, now with extra bite. We've spiced things up with fiery ginger, bold cinnamon, and a lime twist sharp enough to cut through the chaos. Then we slipped in ashwagandha because even rebels deserve stress relief and a clear head. It's a storm in a glass, balanced yet untamed, paying cheeky homage to the Cuban original.
products.longDescription:
Digestion & Stress Relief

Our homemade non-alcoholic rum base is enhanced with adaptogen, ashwagandha to help manage stress, while ginger and cinnamon work together to soothe your digestive system and provide anti-inflammatory benefits.
products.priceSubtext: Min total order 3 bottles. Can mix with other flavours.
products.productBrief: Acquired and aged taste from the perfect blend of ginger & our homemade non-alcoholic rum. The perfect blend of ashwagandha, tea, cinnamon and ginger supports digestion & relieves stress.

products.name: Maca Martini
products.subtitle: Creamy & Chocolaty
products.description: Where earthy maca meets a cheeky trio of coffee and chocolate. It's bold, it's smooth, and it's basically liquid charisma. Sip it when you want to feel like James Bond with a gym membership, libido up, stamina strong, and ready to conquer both boardrooms and ball games. Your ultimate wingman for work and play.
products.longDescription:
Stamina & Libido Boost

Maca root is an ancient Peruvian superfood known for its energy-boosting properties and natural support for hormonal balance and vitality. Combined with mood-enhancing cocoa and energizing coffee, this creamy blend keeps your spirits high and your energy sustained.
products.priceSubtext: Min total order 3 bottles. Can mix with other flavours.
products.productBrief: Creamy & Chocolaty to keep your spirits & mood up. Maca root, cocoa & coffee increases stamina & libido.

products.name: Tequila Sundown
products.subtitle: Refreshing, tart and citrusy
products.description: Whether you're the life of the party, the quiet observer, or somewhere in between, this drink has your back (and your cells). Fresh orange and cranberry bring the immunity boost and antioxidant armor, while mighty Baobab swoops in with fiber and a vitamin lineup worthy of a standing ovation. It's basically your glow-up in a glass. Proof that looking radiant starts from the inside out.
products.longDescription:
Gut health & Immunity support

Fresh orange and cranberry are high in oxidants which protects cell damages from free radical linking to heart diseases, cancer and diabetes. Baobab is high in iron and vitamin C which is good for immunity and gut support. Pairing iron rich food with vitamin C rich fruits enhances iron absorption in the body
products.priceSubtext: Min total order 3 bottles. Can mix with other flavours.
products.productBrief: A refreshing, tart and citrusy mocktail with orange and cranberry. High in antioxidants and vitamin C for gut health and immunity support.

testimonials.text: Halal mocktails & so healthy. Tried Tequila Sundown & Maca Martini sedap sangat!! üòç
My favourite flavour of the 3 is Tequila Sundown üòä. As for Dark & Stormy, I like how it gives my throat a nice warm hug with the ginger kick
We finished the Tequila Sundown and it was still f** madddd as the first day we drank it. We both really fell in love with it
Anna the drinks are top notch. My girlfriend finished the Tequila Sundown and my favourite is the Martini
